isis.stitle: CAB: 5000i AND 9000i CONVENTIONAL - INSTALL - Install CAB DOOR STRIKER PIN

svcproc.title: Install CAB DOOR STRIKER PIN
svcproc.para: Refer to Figure 77 for Items in parentheses unless otherwise noted.

Cab door striker pin (Item 1) mounted on cab lock pillar (Item 2) provides for positive engagement with cab door latch assembly (Item 2, Figure 76) . Door striker pin installation requires a torx head tool (Item 3). Enlarged mounting hole in cab lock pillar permits adjustment.

step1.para: If spacer shims (Item 4) were used between cab lock pillar (Item 2) and cab door striker pin (Item 1), reuse during installation of cab door striker pin, driver side shown.

Position cab door striker pin (Item 1) onto cab lock pillar (Item 2) and thread cab door striker pin into cab lock pillar. Use a torx head tool (Item 3) and tighten to 34 to 50 Lbf-ft (46 to 68 N•m), driver side shown.

If cab door striker pin (Item 1) needs adjustment on cab lock pillar (Item 2) to provide proper latching of cab door, refer to ADJUSTMENTS,
CAB DOOR STRIKER PIN AT LOCK PILLAR
.
